text: Monique Boulestin (born 13 March 1951 in Châlus, Haute-Vienne) is a member of the National Assembly of France. She represents the Haute-Vienne department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:People from Haute-Vienne Category:Radical Party of the Left politicians Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians Category:Knights of the National Order of Merit (France)
title: Monique Boulestin
